website_summaries.verdict: A small, portable axe that works well for the occasional user.
pros: Small size and solid build make it lightweight yet effective
Sharpens well and cuts with precision
cons: Needs frequent sharpening, and blade has been known to chip

customer_reviews.title: Buy this one, over here!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this axe for a family car camping trip to Rocky Mountain National Park. First, the axe is light and compact enough for my medium framed 12 y/o son to split logs endlessly (and enthusiastically). The axe really does seem to chop three times faster. It did finally get somewhat dull after a few days of abuse, but it never lost its splitting power. Overall a great buy and a good seller to deal with.
customer_reviews.author: clayton k jensen

customer_reviews.title: Item does not stand up to typical use
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the item to strap to the side of my four-wheel-drive vehicle and did not use it for nearly 6 months. The first opportunity I had to use it was to chop wood for firewood at the campsite. On day two, The handle broke free from the Axe head. I might add that this was not a handle strike that caused this. The result was actually a quite dangerous situation and fortunately nobody in the surrounding area was hurt.
customer_reviews.author: Philip J. Krueger

customer_reviews.title: I love this axe
customer_reviews.text: It slices... it dices... it makes julienne fries!!! I keep this in the back of my jeep for trail maintenance and a camping axe. I love this axe! It lumber jacks through stuff like Paul Bunyan himself! Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley G.

customer_reviews.title: Very impressive
customer_reviews.text: I am an avid off road driver and this is a great axe that I carry in the Jeep. It is light weight the balance on it is perfect and it holds an edge well. Have used it to chop several small to medium trees and it is as sharp now as it was new. 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Strock

customer_reviews.title: Great little axe!
customer_reviews.text: This a great axe for those who have limited space, like myself. It’s not a full handled one no, but it’s definitely no hatchet. There is plenty of handle to swing it over your head and follow through a whole piece of wood. The blade is sharp and durable as well. You probably won’t chop walnut with it. But it will go through most woods you would take camping. Only thing I don’t like is the open bottom of the handle. Not sure why it’s there, looks like it was made to store something, or that mine was missing a piece.
customer_reviews.author: KF

customer_reviews.title: Axetastic!
customer_reviews.text: Overall I am happy with the axe. Its very sharp and durable and the sheath makes it easy to store or carry. It is on the heavy side so packing it for miles may not be all that fun but it may earn a hard to come by stop in my pack. For car camping or boat camping it is perfect. It cuts very well using it on both soft and hard logs.
customer_reviews.author: Persnickety Client

customer_reviews.title: Really happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This was the weight and size I was going for and I'm surprised how well it chops. I expected to give up more when going for a mid sized axe.
customer_reviews.author: Falcon4

customer_reviews.title: Bext axe I've ever bought!
customer_reviews.text: This thing goes through wood like it's butter. I've even split 3 foot rounds of maple with it! Love it getting the hatchet next!
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: Dirty but no biggy
customer_reviews.text: A little bit dirty but that was probably the reason it was put on sale. Not a big deal, I planned to use it so it will eventually gets dirty.
customer_reviews.author: jasper bill

customer_reviews.title: Perfect camp axe
customer_reviews.text: Extremely sharp and long lasting blade; well balanced; great for splitting wood at the State Park campgrounds. Just what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: James E. Maslanka

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my husband for Christmas. He loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Jurry

customer_reviews.title: Awesome axe!
customer_reviews.text: I love this axe, lightweight but quality. Great for camping.
customer_reviews.author: Cassidy

customer_reviews.title: Nice Axe
customer_reviews.text: Great axe. I used it for chopping wood while camping and so far its been great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my patrol vehicle for trees in the roadway
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: good axe
customer_reviews.text: Good axe but the corner of the blade broke off the first time I used it....
customer_reviews.author: Paul L.

customer_reviews.title: I've only taken this axe on one trip and it worked great. Seems durable and is tough but light enough ...
customer_reviews.text: So far, I've only taken this axe on one trip and it worked great. Seems durable and is tough but light enough to pack.
customer_reviews.author: James G.

customer_reviews.title: Legendary camper
customer_reviews.text: Awesome for camping. Not great for large trunks but superb for alrdy cut wood that you want smaller (camping)
customer_reviews.author: Aj

customer_reviews.title: my son is extremely satisfied with the gerber ax
customer_reviews.text: my son is extremely satisfied with the gerber ax . he chopped down a rather large tree in minutes unbelievable and it still remained sharp
customer_reviews.author: Millie F.

customer_reviews.title: This is probably one of the best axes for it's price.
customer_reviews.text: This baby will do everything. Chops through legs just fine. It'll come out of the skull easy, no bone, no hair, no chunks of brain, perfectly clean. If they're running away, the damn thing is so perfectly balanced that you'll have no trouble throwing it a good 10-20 meters. Just make sure you clean it often and either paint over or get an option without the very visible neon green. In all an excellent product and I'd recommend it for anyone who needs to embed something into someone's nervous system. As always, feel free to...axe...me a question if you're looking for more information on this stellar product.
customer_reviews.author: The dude

customer_reviews.title: Choppin
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for the FJ40. It will flat get with the program lopping off manzanita and small trees. Holds an edge well. Not too heavy but enough weight to do some serious chopping. The blade isn't big enough for any large diameter logs (chainsaw) but small stuff around 4-6" whittles away pretty fast.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny B.

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money !
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son for Christmas and he was very pleased, he plans on using it while hiking and said it is light enough to carry on his hip. Christmas present success !
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: This is a really nice smaller axe
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice smaller axe. It is built great, it says Gerber but it is a Ficsars axe.
customer_reviews.author: birdgirl11

customer_reviews.title: Very good, very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Very good, very satisfied! Is what I want. Ax is very beautiful, in fact I bought is little use to appreciate! Here can't cut down trees, can only return to forest to try!
customer_reviews.author: wujiannan

product_meta.title: Gerber 23.5-Inch Axe [31-002651]
product_meta.description: One of the benefits of the XL Axe II is its solid, easy swing. Coupled with a super-sharp blade made of hardened forged steel possessing excellent edge retention, this axe will chop up to three times deeper than average and provide for greater productivity, which spells out savings in time, effort, and strain on the body of its operator.
feature_bullets: PTFE coated blade reduces friction, chops clean.
Forged steel head construction is durable for long term use.
Composite handle is shock absorbent, reducing hand strain.
Slim sheath ensures safe storage + transport.
Forged Steel Head provides superior chopping strength
composite handle is extremely durable and lightweight
Tactile grip on the nylon handle contributes to relief of body strain and improves control of swing
Overall Length: 23.6", Blade Length: 3.5", Weight: 53.6 oz
